name: Immi
greetingText: I really like your name & the way you smile, btw!
text1: Hari ulang tahunta hari ini dii' :D
textInChatBox: Yaumul milad, barakallah fii umrik dek blah.. blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text6Content: That's why I made this website for you, yes for you!
wishText: I wish you're enjoying your special day yah dek! ;)
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click this, kalau mauki lihat dari awal lagi.
